prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: 一位美丽的女性神祇，全身像，居中站立于纯白背景前。经典油画风格，厚重质感，色彩丰富。她拥有完美无瑕的容颜，五官精致绝伦，面容姣好，散发出智慧与魅力的光辉。皮肤细腻，泛着温暖柔和的光泽。她的表情宁静而充满共情力，眼神深邃，蕴含着极高的智慧与洞察力。一头流光般的长发，颜色是从浅金到日暮橙红的渐变，如同熔化的阳光，发丝间闪烁着微光，优雅地披散在身后。她身穿一袭飘逸的长裙，风格古典而神圣，主色调为白色与金色。裙身采用轻盈的薄纱与丝绸材质，表面有精细的金线刺绣，图案是舒展的太阳纹、藤蔓与星辰。裙摆流动，仿佛由光线编织而成，闪烁着柔和的金色光晕。她的姿态端庄而充满力量，周身萦绕着温暖的金色微光，完美体现了“曦光界”太阳神之女的身份与唯美细腻的神话世界基调。禁止生成任何文字、符号、乱码或词语。, full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.

side.prompt:
Generate a full-body, side-view portrait of character protagonist based on the provided front-view portrait, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Facing left. Standing with arms relaxed at sides.
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.

back.prompt:
Generate a full-body, back-view portrait of character protagonist based on the provided front-view portrait, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. No facial features should be visible.
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
